name: Laser Connection
description:
In Laser Connection you play a scientist trapped in his laboratory. You'll have to resolve puzzles to make the connection between the laser emitter and a computer that open doors. Be carefull to not touch the laser... it might kill you.

Jump         Arrow Key Up Move Left or Right          Arrow Key Left/Right

-

Music : https://yadu.itch.io/mini-loops

-

The game was created by Matteo Benaissa in 3 hours for the GMTK 2021 Jam with the theme Joined Together. (Result : )

MY OTHER GAMES
